doc.title: Young Love
doc.plot: A Lascivious look at lust & libidos on the loose... It's the late 1960's or early 1970's where guys and gals enjoy fantastic, uninhibited sex together. Exchanging partners creates no jealousy and from the guys in the band to the groupies - this free-for-all generation of young love gets it on. A look at the sexual experimentation of the times.
